name: A Den for Us All
description:
All werewolves live by 3 laws.

  1. Do not reveal the secret to the general populace.
  2. We are no more monstrous now than we were before The Change.
  3. Pack bonds formed by choice are stronger than any others.

Build your pack, build your hideout, and roll a D6 to see what conflicts arise. Will your pack work together through their trials, or will the tensions be too high to cooperate properly? How do you protect the humans around you from the true monsters in the night?

This storytelling game can be used as a precursor to other systems or a standalone game that can be played in as little as an hour with only a D6 needed for events.
